From: a********5@gmail.com
To: nv01017@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-29 16:12:01
SUBJECT: Re: ATTN: SIR,
Hello,Joseph
Thank you for this message and let me explain some certain issue to you why
the lawyer need this money.
1: The lawyer need this money to obtain the require document that the
Emirate NBD Bank are demanding for and the reason why the banks are
demanding for this document is that there was no document in your name as
change of ownership and by international law any banks in the world should
have document for purpose of making any international funds wires.
2: I understand that in your country you don't need any document to
transfer money. But the rule of law in most of the Arab countries before
you send money out the sender need to show purpose of making transfer and
the reason of doing all this is because them to avoid money laundering and
many more.
3: The payment will cover three documents and this document will have to be
obtain at the high court of Dubai and with out this money the lawyer can
not get this documents and obtain this money. So i should inform that once
this document can be obtain the ownership so that Emirate NBD Bank will
have authority to wire this funds.
I will be waiting to hear from you as soon as possible,
My regards,
Barr Mohammed Hamdan.

From: a********5@gmail.com
To: nv01017@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-30 13:11:22
SUBJECT: Re: ATTN: SIR,
Dear Joseph
Greetings! In furtherance to your response to my communication, We can open
an offshore account for you with Dubai Islamic bank with uninterrupted
online banking access. In order for you to open and operate an account with
the bank which will accommodate such exorbitant amount as the one in this
transaction, you will need to open an account type called the PREMIUM GOLD
ACCOUNT. This account type allows the online transfer, to and fro the
account of funds in the excess of US$30 Millions and also give the account
owner "Mr. Matias Alvarez" the ability to operate the account in absential,
that is from any part of the world, also, the funds in this account cannot
be affected by the effect of taxation and as such is the best option for
this transaction.
Note: This account can be operational within 48 hours (Within record and
safe time.) of the payment of the minimum account opening balance of
US$2,500.00. Note: That this minimum account opening balance of US$2,500.00
is not a fee, it is lodged into the account and makes the account active to
receive the funds and if you wish, you can take out the minimum account
opening balance of US$ 2,500.00 once the account becomes active and the
funds can be transferred into the account.
We cannot go with the first option of you opening an account which would
take a management period of (1 week for opening). Let me know your thoughts
as regards the option (2°) Providing a corporate bank account to receive
the capital.)  And we can complete this within the shortest possible time
FOR TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE.
The signed M.O.U by Mr. Evans Lescouflair would be sent to you ASAP for
your perusal and record.
Kind regards,
Barr. Mohammed Hamdan.
